gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 99, Spurs 97
gameRecap.excerpt: Jaren Jackson Jr. hit a floater with 1.2 seconds remaining to lift the Grizzlies over the Spurs, 99-97. Jaren Jackson Jr. recorded 28 points, seven rebounds and two blocks for the Grizzlies, with Scotty Pippen Jr. adding 18 points and three rebounds in the victory. Victor Wembanyama tallied 31 points, 16 rebounds, and five assists for the Spurs in the defeat. The Grizzlies improve to 24-47, while the Spurs fall to 15-55.
